name: French Cinma: An Introduction
description: A historical perspective on French films with a focus on the specificity of French cinma, from the Poetic Realism of the Thirties to the New Wave of the Fifties and Sixties, the "Cinma du look" of the Eighties and the various genres of contemporary French cinema: heritage film, film noir and comedies in particular. Recommended foundation course for FRE397H5. [24L, 12P, 12T]
prerequisites: FRE280Y5 or a minimum grade of 77% in FSL406H5 or equivalent.
